original_title: 俺を好きなのはお前だけかよ ～俺たちのゲームセット～
overview: The original video anime episode will serve as the final chapter to the television series, focusing on the rivalry between the "background character" Amatsuyu Kisaragi (Jouro) and Yasuo Hazuki (Hose), "the protagonist."
title: ORESUKI Are you the only one who loves me - Our Game Set
